NEWRELIC_KEY.description: The API key to your New Relic account.

SECRET.description: The application secret used to encrypt cookie and session data.

USPS_USER.description: The API key to USPS account.

FACEBOOK_APPID.description: The Facebook API key used to for sharing.

OPENFDA_APIKEY.description: The openFDA API key. Providing this allows more requests per minute/per day

STATUS_PAGE_IO_URL.description: The url for your StatusPage.io service
